html.problem:
Video Tutorial: Block hanged by two strings
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
T1="2*m*g/(1+sqrt(3))"
T2="2*m*g/(sqrt(2)*(1+sqrt(3)))"
A block of mass m is hanging by two strings of negligible mass as shown in the figure. String 1 is at an angle of 60o with the horizontal and string 2 at an angle of 45o with respect to the horizontal. Find the magnitude of the force of tension on strings 1 and 2. Express your answers in terms of m and g, and plug in the value for the trigonometric functions (e.g. if you want to input cos(30) , use sqrt(3)/2 instead).
T1=
T2=

A block supported by two strings
